title.en: The Pulsing Nexus of Emerald Breath

description.ko: 심해 숲 모든 생명의 근원이 되는 유기적 심장 구조물로, 액체 빛의 리드미컬한 흐름과 이끼 낀 생체 발광의 정교한 질감을 보여줍니다.
description.en: A central organic heart-like structure that serves as the source of all life in a deep underwater forest, showcasing the rhythmic flow of liquid light and the intricate textures of mossy bioluminescence.

prompt: A colossal, levitating neural heart-blossom composed of translucent emerald-moss petals and glowing amber vascular pathways, pulsing rhythmically at the center of a deep oceanic abyss. The core radiates a soft #FFE66D golden glow, with liquid light flowing through #7FB069 organic membranes exhibiting heavy subsurface scattering. Wispy, bioluminescent tendrils and #E6F2E1 glowing spores drift in the #2D5A3D dark green water, illuminated by dramatic volumetric light shafts piercing through the depths. Rendered in Unreal Engine 5 with Octane Render, 8k resolution, hyper-realistic. Cinematic composition with global illumination reflecting off floating organic particles, focusing on the microscopic, breathing textures of the flowing liquid light and the intricate architecture of the organic life.
